column2: East Rancho Dominguez Park was completely renovated in 2004 to become one of the most appealing recreational facilities in the South County Community Services Agency. The five-acre park includes a well equipped gymnasium
column4: and the tennis courts where Venus Williams and Serena Williams played as children. The park has year-round recreational programs including youth sports
column6: the “Amp It Up!” summer lunch program
column8: and summer and after-school day camps.
